Description: Postcard; printed; photograph of a gold sarcophagus.
Curator's comments: Used, but not posted; message written in Arabic which can be literally translated as follows: "Dear Osama, my best greetings and kisses to you. Hoping from God that you would be on best form. Anyway, a thousand congratulations and I miss the days of taking photographs with the Japanese women ... Please give my regards to everyone at your end. Your brother Mahmud".
